title: Fails to detect SSE support properly

content.raw:
On my machine it prints
```
-- Searching for host SSE information
-- Could not find hardware support for SSE3 on this machine.
-- Could not find hardware support for SSSE3 on this machine.
-- Could not find hardware support for SSE4.1 on this machine.
-- Could not find hardware support for SSE4.2 on this machine.
-- SSE2 found
-- SSE4 disabled.
```
while https://gist.github.com/hi2p-perim/7855506#file-ssecheck-cpp prints
```
$ ssecheck
SSE:1
SSE2:1
SSE3:1
SSE4.1:1
SSE4.2:1
SSE4a:0
SSE5:0
AVX:0
```
content.html:
On my machine it prints

-- Searching for host SSE information
-- Could not find hardware support for SSE3 on this machine.
-- Could not find hardware support for SSSE3 on this machine.
-- Could not find hardware support for SSE4.1 on this machine.
-- Could not find hardware support for SSE4.2 on this machine.
-- SSE2 found
-- SSE4 disabled.

while https://gist.github.com/hi2p-perim/7855506#file-ssecheck-cpp prints

$ ssecheck
SSE:1
SSE2:1
SSE3:1
SSE4.1:1
SSE4.2:1
SSE4a:0
SSE5:0
AVX:0
